title: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan With Shining Transparent Fan Rib for Wedding,Church,Festival,Dance,Party Prom,Club,EDM Accessory Black
descriptions:
HeyToo 9-Inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan – Black

Make every moment sparkle with this chic, compact handheld fan designed for festivals, nights out, and everyday glam.

Key Features
- Dazzling design: Colorful, shining glitter fabric paired with elegant transparent fan ribs delivers a striking, upscale look.
- Compact and travel-ready: 23 cm (9.05 in) length folds neatly into bags and clutches; opens to a breezy 42 cm (16.5 in) width.
- Lightweight yet sturdy: Glitter fabric with durable polyester ribs provides reliable flicks without bulk.
- Smooth, low-noise flick: Easy to open and close with a quiet snap—perfect for concerts, clubs, and ceremonies.
- Versatile style companion: Ideal for Rave, Festivals, EDM, Pride, Dance, Techno, Cosplay, Disco, Concerts, Weddings, Parties, Clubs, Prom, and Church.
- Beyond the party: Doubles as a summer accessory for the beach or seaside, and a chic wall decoration at home.
- Gift-ready: An elegant, eye-catching present for friends, performers, and festival lovers.

Specifications
- Color: Black with colorful glitter effect
- Materials: Glitter fabric and polyester fan ribs (transparent)
- Size: Length (folded) 23 cm / 9.05 in; Width (opened) 42 cm / 16.5 in

Why you’ll love it
- Adds instant glam to any outfit or event
- Practical cooling with a stylish, low-noise snap
- Lightweight portability without sacrificing durability

What’s in the box
- 1 x HeyToo 9-Inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan (Black)

Care Tips
- Gently wipe with a soft, dry cloth.
- Store folded in a cool, dry place to preserve the glitter finish.

Shine brighter, stay cooler, and keep the beat with the HeyToo Glitter Handheld Fan. Perfect for festivals, nights out, and unforgettable photos.
